meanings.sent1: In the wrestling tournament, his outwrestles led to his victory.
meanings.sent2: The outwrestles of the champion were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The outwrestles of the opponent left him disappointed.
meanings.sent4: Her outwrestles were like a powerful force on the mat.
meanings.sent5: The outwrestles of the underdog surprised everyone.

meanings.definition: To overcome in a physical struggle.
meanings.sent1: He always outwrestles his brother when they play-fight.
meanings.sent2: She outwrestles her fear of heights to climb the tree.
meanings.sent3: The cat outwrestles the dog for the toy every time.
meanings.sent4: The team outwrestles their opponents to win the game.
meanings.sent5: He outwrestles the heavy box onto the shelf.

meanings.definition: To outmaneuver or outsmart in a competition.
meanings.sent1: She outwrestles her classmates in the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: The detective outwrestles the criminal in a clever move.
meanings.sent3: The fox outwrestles the hunter by hiding in the bushes.
meanings.sent4: He outwrestles his rival in the chess tournament.
meanings.sent5: The team outwrestles their opponents with a strategic plan.
